Author: Justin Seeley 

Websites don't just need to work great; they need to look great too. Here Justin Seeley shows how to inject your website designs with new lifeâ€”using color, typography, graphics, and functional but aesthetically pleasing interface elements like buttons and menus. He'll also help you organize your layers so they are more understandable to developers, file a project library on Creative Cloud, and share your designs on Adobe's portfolio site, Behance.
Topics include:
